duns.description: The 9-digit DUNS number of the awardee

duns4.description: The 4-digit extension to the DUNS number indicating subcomponents of the entity

cage.description: Commercial And Government Entity (CAGE) Code is a unique identifier assigned to an entity which provides a standardized method of identifying a given facility at a specific location. All US entities must meet a CAGE Code validation process, or will be assigned one by the Defense Logistics Information Service (DLIS).

ncage.description: CAGE Codes that are used internationally as part of the NATO Codification System (NCS) are called NCAGE codes.  All foreign entities must provide an NCAGE Code

dodaac.description: The Department of Defense Activity Address Code (DODAAC) for non-civilian government agencies (DoD).  This is filled with the letters "DOD" followed by the agency's 6 digit DoDAAC number

purposeOfRegistration.description: Indicates whether the entity is seeking contracts, grants, or intergovernmental transfers

registrationDate.description: The date the initial entity registration was submitted, this date will not change

expirationDate.description: A system generated date for the date when the entity's registration expires.  Any time the user updates the company's information; this date needs to be updated to the current date.

activationDate.description: The date on which the entity's registration went active after all validations were completed.

lastUpdatedDate.description: The last date on which the entity's registration was updated.

legalBusinessName.description: The legal business name of the entity.

doingBusinessAsName.description: The Doing Business As (DBA) name of the entity provided by D&B monitoring

companyDivision.description: This field is the Division Name as provided by the Entity

divisionNumber.description: This field is the Division Number as provided by the Entity

samAddress.description: The address provided by the entity for contact

congressionalDistrict.description: The Congressional District in which the entity resides, per their SAM address

businessStartDate.description: The date the entity was started or acquired

fiscalYearCloseDay.description: The day of the year in MMYY format that corresponds to the day on which the company's fiscal year closes

corporateUrl.description: The URL provided by the entity for the corporation

corporateStructureCode.description: The structure of the entity as defined by the IRS as a code.

corporateStructureDescription.description: The expanded description of the corporate structure

mailingAddress.description: The mailing address for the entity

stateOfIncorporation.description: The US state in which the entity was incorporated, if applicable

countryOfIncorporation.description: The country code where the entity was incorporated. This follows the ISO3166 3-digit format. SAM can also accommodate 2 character country codes

govtBusinessPoc.description: The point of contact for government business within the entity

altGovtBusinessPoc.description: The alternate point of contact for government business within the entity

pastPerformancePoc.description: The point of contact for past performance information for business within the entity

altPastPerformancePoc.description: The alternate point of contact for past performance information for business within the entity

electronicBusinessPoc.description: The point of contact for electronic business transactions within the entity

altElectronicBusinessPoc.description: The alternate point of contact for electronic business transactions within the entity

creditCardUsage.description: Indicates whether an entity is willing to be paid by Government credit card

hasDelinquentFederalDebt.description: The Delinquent Federal Debt (DFD) Certification (Flag) tracks status of an outstanding Delinquent Federal Debt owed by the registrant. This flag set to true indicates that the registrant has been determined to have a delinquent obligation owed to the U. S. Federal Government as shown by records at the Department of the Treasury. This flag set to false means the Treasury Department found no delinquent obligation. A non-entry [-] indicates that this registrant has not yet been verified with Treasury. Foreign registrations are not verified.

hasKnownExclusion.description: This flag indicates whether an entity has an exclusion record

correspondenceFlag.description: This field is used to identify an entity's preferred correspondence type. 'M' indicates US Mail', 'F' indicates fax, 'E' indicates email

status.description: The status of the entity's registration

statusMessage.description: The text description of the status of the entity's registration

businessTypes.description: An array of business types determined by SBA or Ability One

sbaCertificationExpirationDate.description: The date on which an entity's SBA certification expires

disasterRelief.description: An array which describes the disaster relief locations which can be serviced by the entity.

pscCodes.description: The Product Service Codes, described by objects, which the entity supports

certifications.description: An object wrapping a URL linking to a PDF of certification data

qualifications.description: An object wrapping a URL linking to a PDF of qualifications data
